title: Pandemic Turns Floridaâ€™s West Palm Beach Into Office Boomtown
sub_head: Financial firms are setting up shop in the area, and developers like Related Cos. are looking to cash in
body:
An influx of financial firms from New York and other locations is fueling an office-leasing boom and new development in West Palm Beach, Fla.
Related Cos. said Tuesday that it plans to build two office properties in the city with a price tag of about $750 million.
